# Overview

This repository contains Angular Schematic for adding and configuring Native Angular Telerik Report Viewer in a Angular 15-17 application.
This schematic is not intended for standalone usage. It is invoked from the Visual Studio Code extensions for Telerik Reporting.

## Usage

To add the Native Angular Telerik Report Viewer to your Angular app, use the following command from the Visual Studio Code terminal:

`
npx ng g @progress/telerik-reporting-schematics:native-report-viewer report-viewer-page
`
